prodNameE: Beckman Coulter IOTest CD4 monoclonal antibody
ingredientsDesc:
Specifications
Specificity 	CD4
Clone	13B8.2
Hybridoma	NS1 x Balb/c
Immunogen	Human thymocytes
Immunoglobulin	IgG1
Species	Mouse
Source	Ascites
Purification	Protein A affinity chromatography
Fluorochrome	FITC	PE	PC5

Emission	525 nm	575 nm	670 nm
Buffer	PBS pH 7.2 plus 2 mg / mL BSA and 0.1% NaN3

efficacy: 這個螢光標定的抗體允許使用流式細胞儀鑑定及計算人類生物性檢體中表現CD4抗原的細胞族群。
